name: John SMITH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Smith v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: John SMITH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
MOTION TO DISMISS FOR MOOTNESS
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of October, 2006, the Motion to Dismiss for Mootness is granted.
Justice NEWMAN dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
907 A.2d 519
John SMITH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 68 MAP 2005.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 6, 2006.
